      • initialize

        void initialize(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                org.apache.sling.api.resource.ValueMap properties)
         throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException,
                javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Initialize the Bulk Workflow Manager jcr:content node and build out the batch structure.
        Parameters:
        resource - jcr:content resource
        properties - a valuemap containing all requisite properties
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

        Returns:
